mapper.select: SELECT b.id AS id, b.a_id AS aId, a.name AS authorityName, c.id as menuId, c.name AS menuName, b.view_yn AS viewYn, b.edit_yn AS editYn FROM authority a, authority_community b, community_menu c WHERE a.id = b.a_id AND b.menu_id = c.id AND b.a_id = #{aId}

SELECT b.id AS id, b.a_id AS aId, a.name AS authorityName, c.id as menuId, c.name AS menuName, b.view_yn AS viewYn, b.edit_yn AS editYn FROM authority a, authority_wiki b, wiki_menu c WHERE a.id = b.a_id AND b.menu_id = c.id AND b.a_id = #{aId}
SELECT d.id, d.name, d.authority, a.name as authorityName FROM department d, authority a WHERE d.authority = a.id
